title: Part One: Joe Arpaio: America's Favorite Concentration Camp Operator
itunes:title: Part One: Joe Arpaio: America's Favorite Concentration Camp Operator
description:
Robert is joined by Noah Shachtman to discuss Joe Arpaio.
